TopicTitle: My mod caused the loading to stop

Articles.Content:
Hi! I'm new to modding. This is actually the first mod I ever made in my life.

I made my own mod by making my own .DAE and texture map and changing the settings from the .cfg file. However, when the game is loading, the game stops at my mod and does not continue loading the rest. It is literally stuck. I checked if everything has been corrected but still the same result.

How do I do this?

Press Alt+F2 to see the debug console. there should be error message. Most likely the cause of error is the collider mesh: either there's no node_collider object (or maybe you named it incorrectly) or it has too many polygons.

Note also that in some cases mesh file generation can take several minutes. Or if there was an error with that delete the mesh folder and let it run again.
It said "Collider Node found, but no mesh in it" but there are meshes.
That error means that you don't have a node_collider in your model, this component controls hit detection and is vital.
